column5: Here's some pics of our summer vacation out north of Kingston this past August. Had some issues with my camera so I ended up bringing most of the fish back to the beach in the livewell for a quick photo after which they were all released (alive!)  Here's a nice Largemouth I got out of the slop on a Berkley frog    parked on an island for some fishing and Jr. got this little largie with a worm   He got this Smallmouth on the first day   And a big Largemouth back in the weeds while I was retreiving a snag. He used a mini tube hooked on a red devil spoon   A nice Smallmouth I got on a sluggo   Another smallie at sunset for Jr. on a tube jig   Mr. pike smashed a white moss boss at the edge of the lily pads   jjcanoe
Nice fish man!Nice to see JR doing so well.  MTP
nice report,your son did quite well,congrats
Great to see the young lad into fish !! Memories in the making..
He constantly outfishes me!  It's happy and depressing all at the same time!  jjcanoe
I have three of them "depressors" JJ...now 24/22 and 19 and fishing with me since they were in diapers. They still outfish me to this day....get use to it ! LOL
Ya the Lack of Wayne fish pics in your summer reports told the whole story Wayne  .Good thing you do well in the BOQ

D'oh! He just turned 6 2 weeks ago and has been doing it since he was 3!  Hmmm, 24-6= 18 more years, then again the daughter is still only 4 months old so I bet I can still outfish her for a few more years.  jjcanoe
Hmm you kinda look like that famous poker star Mike Matusow, lol. NICE FISH AND REPORT!!!!!!!!!!!!
Great pictures and report! Always good to get out fished by your kids!
Nice bass. Your son looks very happy. Thanks for sharing.
Nice report, well done getting the young ones involved.
Nice fish pics !!!!!! thats some nice bass you caught this summer,and the little one did great too....cheers
